input.sentences: i washed some canned garbanzo beans .
then i combined some herbs and curry .
next i mashed them all together and added some chopped onions .
last | but not least | a bunch of cilantro was added .
output.sentences: I washed and drained the canned garbanzo beans.
Next I combined the herbs and curry to make a fragrant mix.
Then I chopped the onions and mashed the garbanzo beans.
I added a bunch of cilantro to the onions.
I fried all of it up which resulted in fresh falafel.
